Project Holter-Monitor


Project Holter monitor is to make a cost efficient heart rate monitor which can be simply worn on the body and helps measure heart rate anytime at a regular basis. The key feature of this project is its cost efficiency compared to industrial products. The cost of a holter monitor that we make would be around 3500 any holter monitor in the market which has all the features as ours at the moment costs atleast 30,000.
